data.question: What is the chemical formula of MFM-303(Al)?
At what temperature (K) were the single crystal X-ray diffraction data of MFM-303(Al) collected?
What is the maximum interatomic force after relaxation in the DFT calculations?
How was the enthalpy of adsorption for NH3 in MFM-303(Al) determined?
data.answer: By integrating the area under the normalised heat flow curve in Differential Scanning Calorimetry (DSC).

data.question: Is MFM-303(Al) stable after NH3 sorption?
What is the dynamic NH3 capacity of MFM-303(Al) under dry conditions?
What method was used to simulate the INS spectra for NH3-loaded MFM-303(Al)?
data.answer: Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations followed by conversion of the phonon results to simulated INS spectra using OClimax software.

data.question: What was the yield of the synthesis of MFM-303(Al)?
Does the structure of MFM-303(Al) contain defects?
data.answer: There is little evidence for defects based on 1H NMR and TGA analysis.

data.question: What is the enthalpy of adsorption for NH3 in MFM-303(Al) as determined by DSC?
What is the dynamic NH3 capacity of MFM-303(Al) under wet conditions?
What is the reduction in adsorption capacity of MFM-303(Al) when moving from dry to wet conditions?
What is the surface area of MFM-303(Al) based upon the CO2 isotherm?
Was the NH3 desorption from MFM-303(Al) observed in the TPD experiments?
data.answer: Yes, an uptake of ∼2.4 mmol g-1 was released at ∼150–200 °C.

data.question: What is the pore volume of MFM-303(Al) as determined by DFT/Monte-Carlo fitting?
What is the crystal system and space group of as-synthesised MFM-303(Al)?
What is the role of the free carboxylic and available hydroxyl groups in MFM-303(Al)?
data.answer: They act as binding sites for NH3 to yield a high packing density.

data.question: Is the NH3 uptake in MFM-303(Al) reversible?
What is the crystal size of MFM-303(Al)?
What is the role of defects in the high density of NH3 in MFM-303(Al)?
data.answer: There is little evidence for defects affecting NH3 density based on the analysis provided.
